languages.text: {n}Друкари медленно опускается на одно колено.{/n} "Прошу тебя, {name}. Я сделаю все, чтобы ты никогда не забыл{mf||а} этой прогулки".
{n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари медленно опускается на одно колено.{/n} "Прошу тебя, {name}. Я сделаю все, чтобы ты никогда не забыл{mf||а} этой прогулки".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."
{n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."
{n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."
{n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋慢慢地单膝跪地。{/n}“拜托了，{name}。我会尽我所能，为你带来永生难忘的盛宴。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋慢慢地单膝跪地。{/n}“拜托了，{name}。我会尽我所能，为你带来永生难忘的盛宴。”

languages.text: {n}デュカーリはゆっくりと片膝をつく。{/n}「頼むよ、{name}。全力を尽くして、この散歩を忘れられないものにして見せるからさ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリはゆっくりと片膝をつく。{/n}「頼むよ、{name}。全力を尽くして、この散歩を忘れられないものにして見せるからさ」

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari clava lentamente una rodilla en el suelo.{/n} «Por favor, {name}. Haré todo lo que está en mi mano para prepararte un paseo inolvidable».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari clava lentamente una rodilla en el suelo.{/n} «Por favor, {name}. Haré todo lo que está en mi mano para prepararte un paseo inolvidable».

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari s'agenouille lentement.{/n} « S'il vous plaît, {name}. Je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour faire de votre initiation un moment inoubliable. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari s'agenouille lentement.{/n} « S'il vous plaît, {name}. Je ferai tout ce qui est en mon pouvoir pour faire de votre initiation un moment inoubliable. »

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari kniet langsam ab.{/n} "Bitte, {name}. Ich werde alles in meiner Macht Stehende tun, damit unser kleiner Spaziergang unvergesslich für Euch wird."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari kniet langsam ab.{/n} "Bitte, {name}. Ich werde alles in meiner Macht Stehende tun, damit unser kleiner Spaziergang unvergesslich für Euch wird."

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, yavaşça tek dizinin üzerine çöküyor.{/n} "Lütfen {name}. Bu yürüyüşün hafızandan asla silinmemesi için elimden gelen her şeyi yapacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari slowly drops to one knee.{/n} "Please, {name}. I will do everything in my power to make this a walk you will never forget."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari, yavaşça tek dizinin üzerine çöküyor.{/n} "Lütfen {name}. Bu yürüyüşün hafızandan asla silinmemesi için elimden gelen her şeyi yapacağım."
